titleStmt.title: Letters of Appeal - Request for Woman's Address
titleStmt.author: G. D. Rogers

publicationStmt.p: This document forms part of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Archive" at the University of North Florida.

msIdentifier.repository: University of North Florida, Thomas G. Carpenter Library Special Collections and Archives

objectDesc.p: Typed letter using both black and red ink from G. D. Rogers to Eartha M. M. White on 11/12/1930 regarding the location of a woman who used to live at 2001 Davis Street.

editorialDecl.p: This file was transcribed and encoded according to the editorial criteria of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Archive." Using the various options encoded within <choice> elements, this file enables the viewing of a diplomatic transcription and a regularized reading text.

head.hi:
Bradenton. Fla.Florida
Nov. 12th 1930November twelfth, nineteen thirty.

body.head:
Mrs. Eartha. M.M.White.
Jax.Jacksonville Fla.Florida
body.p:
I am told by Mr. C.E.Todd. that you might give me some infor
mation concerning a woman that lived sometime ago at 2001 Davis St.Street.
sheShe had a nephew that died here last Aug and he was a veteran of the
last WAR,last WARrefers to the First World War because that is the war that precedes this letter's date of 1929 and left her his insurance and I cannitcannot locate her,. If you
know her and know anything about her whereabouts kindly let me
know

note.hi: Notary Publicthis phrase is written in a different hand and different pencil to the one above
